summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Del Monte Sauerkraut 14.5 oz. (3-Pack) Review Date: 2014/07/13 Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.4 x 4.9 x 2.9 inches; 14.46 Ounces', 'UPC': '741655221609'} Review Text: We have strayed from a national name brand of sauer kraut and was that a big mistake. The store brand was one that almost everyone set aside on their plate and did not eat. We went back to a name brand and that was Del Monte. The kraut we think is the best on the market. We do nto like that other kinds of kraut such as Bavarian. We want the real stuff, at least to us it is the real stuff. Did you know the whole 14.5 oz can only has 10 calories in it and zero fat. Even for carbs there is only 1g. Now this is where we definitely go wrong as we serve it with smoked sausage, which we know is totally off the chart. Don't do this often---just occasionally. The meal is delicious. I do have a note fro Del Monte. Remember when your cans contained 16 oz of kraut, then you cut back and now it's 14.5 oz. Please quit doing this to us!.Do you realize, and I am sure you do, that I now have about 10% LESS to serve to my family. Review Title: Some Of The Best Sauer Kraut There Is ! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spa Grade Jade Roller for Face with Gua Sha | Jade Face Roller Massager | Jade Facial Roller | Face Roller Massager | Jade Rollers | Wrinkle Roller Review Date: 2018/12/14 Store: Jane Cosmetics Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 3.4 x 1.2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '814689026516', 'Manufacturer': 'Jane & Co.'} Review Text: This Jade face roller and Jade Gua Sha tool comes packaged nicely. This roller is a little nicer than the last one I reviewed, therefore the reason for the 5 start. We enjoy using this one more than our other one. This is better put together and seems to be a grade or two better. Review Title: Jade Roller Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 10 Fluid Ounce Review Date: 2019/11/15 Store: Mountain Falls Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Weight': '0.7 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Fl Oz'} Review Text: Another quality product from Mountain Falls. This Regular Nail Polish Remover does its job. It is easy to remove old nail polish using this product. This is a 10 oz bottle of polish remover. Good nail polish remover. Review Title: Works Well. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Review Date: 2020/07/29 Store: Wonder4 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} Review Text: I already have a single disk callus remover but this triple disk callus remover is much nicer. This remover has 1 head that rotates to 3 different buffing disks. There is a rough, medium and smooth grinding disk. These disk do a great job. There is a small cleaning brush and a USB cord include. The device appears to be well made. The speed on the head is good and does not slow down when using. I have only charged this device once and it is still running. This is a good product at a good price. Highly recommend. Review Title: Good Triple Disk Callus Remover Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: DAN Technology Anti-Scald 200℉-500℉ Electric Press Hot Comb for Black Hair, Beard and Wigs, Ceramic Unisex Hair Beard Straightener and Curler, Dual Voltage for Travel, Home and Salon Use Review Date: 2020/08/30 Store: DAN Technology Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DAN Technology', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Item Weight': '0.6 Pounds', 'Package Dimensions': '12.9 x 4.8 x 2.4 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'DAN Technology'} Review Text: My daughter really likes this Dan Technology Hot Comb.

There are several features that she likes.
1. The cord swivels 360 degrees. No more tangled up cord.
2. Variable temperature. (200-500 degree)
3. Fairly fast heat up.
4. Easy grip handle. The handle is small enough for her to grip easily.
5. The head still heated the entire time she was doing her hair.

She is happy with this heated comb. Review Title: Daughter Likes This Straightening Hot Comb Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MEACOLIA Water Mist Empty Spray Bottle for Hair,Plastic Spray Bottle for Cleaning Solutions,Refillable Container with Adjustable Head(Pack of 3,8 oz) Review Date: 2020/10/19 Store: MEACOLIA Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MEACOLIA', 'Capacity': '2.4 Pounds', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable Head, Mist Spray', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '10.08 x 6.85 x 3.23 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '190431086381'} Review Text: There are 3 clear plastic spray bottles in this set. All the bottles are the same 8 oz size. I like the spray handles. They fit in my hand and are easy to spray. The sprayer can be set 3 ways.... OFF, STREAM, and MIST. I am currently using the mist on my plants. The liquid comes out evenly and does not drip out of the nozzle. The pick up hose inside the bottle goes all the way to the bottom so you get all the liquid. These are 3 good spray bottles and well worth the price. Review Title: Good size plastic spray bottles Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spray Bottle,Fine Mist Mini Clear50ml/2oz Spray Bottles,Small Reusable Empty Plastic Bottles with Atomizer Pumps (25 pack,2 Funnels included) Review Date: 2020/11/02 Store: Woaiwo-q Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Woaiwo-q', 'Material': 'Polypropylene', 'Capacity': '50 Milliliters, 60 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray'} Review Text: These are nice small, short plastic bottles. The bottles are approx 3" tall. Each bottle comes with a fine spray mister. The bottles hold 2 oz each. These are nice small bottles. These only come out to be 32 cents each. They are will worth this cost if you need bottles this small. Review Title: Small Short Fine Mist Plastic Bottle Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Make-up Organizers Storage Cosmetic Organizer Display Case Dustproof Storage Box Waterproof Holder Used for Bathroom w/Handle Christmas Gift 12"L x 16"H White Review Date: 2020/11/06 Store: LOMANTOWN Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Mounting Type Tabletop Mount': '', '': 'Unit Count 1.00 Count', 'Specific Uses For Product': 'Makeup Organizer,Cosmetic Organizer,Bathroom', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof,Durable', 'Brand': 'LOMANTOWN', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '17.25 x 13.25 x 10.35 inches; 5.6 Pounds'} Review Text: I am not impressed with this makeup organizer. This organizer reminds me of the inexpensive makeup box I use to buy my girls when they were 6 years old. I expected a lot more from this organizer considering it cost almost $55. This is a plastic organizer. The organizer has some scuff marks on the body and then a couple on the clear top lid. I am disappointed with this organizer especially at this price point. Review Title: Not Impressed Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spray Bottle, 1.7oz / 50ml Transparent Empty Fine Mist Plastic Reusable Travel Bottle Set, With 4 Funnels And 6 Labels, Suitable For Perfume, Essential Oil Spray, Medical Alcohol, Etc. (4 Pieces) Review Date: 2020/11/08 Store: Staont Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Staont', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '1.7 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4.5 x 1.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '682604904566'} Review Text: This package consist of 4 small plastic bottles. Each bottle holds 1.7oz of liquid. Each bottle has a fine mist sprayer and a cap to cover the sprayer. We have used 2 bottles and each one did a good job spraying. The cap sealed good and there were no leaks. There are 4 funnels to use when filling your bottles. Overall, I am happy with these bottles. Review Title: Good Little Bottles Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy Review Date: 2021/01/10 Store: AYL Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} Review Text: This package of 2 glass spray bottles and supplies is perfect. Basically everything to make using these empty bottles easy and useful. The box includes 2 empty amber spray bottles, 2 black leak-proof caps, 2 black spray head, 1 stainless funnel, 1 glass dropper, 4 black stickers, and 1 white marker. The bottles can be filled with 16 oz of whatever liquid you need. The bottles can be used as spray bottles or can be used with tight fitting leak proof caps. The funnel makes filling the bottles easy also. We love this set and highly recommend it. Review Title: Perfect Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Steamer with Portable Mini Cold Facial Mister, Face Steamer for Facial Deep Cleaning, Nano Ionic Face Hot Steaming Machine for Home Facials Personal Moisturizing Skincare Beauty Review Date: 2021/02/10 Store: ROSEFEAST Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Brand': 'ROSEFEAST', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Cold,Moisturizing,Relaxing,Clean,Aromatherapy', 'Package Dimensions': '8.31 x 7.87 x 4.57 inches; 1.57 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'ROSEFEAST'} Review Text: This is a small facial steamer that has had good results for my daughter. She has another unit that must be 3X bigger than this unit. This unit is approx 5.25" x 3.5" x 6.5" tall. This is a compact unit. We were first concerned that this would even work but after a few uses she is very happy with the operation of this unit. The unit includes the main compact unit, a small hand held unit, a mask, and 4 tools. I took 1 star away because of the price. She is happy with the results. Review Title: Small Unit, Good Results Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: DOYIZZ Makeup Brushes Set, 10pcs Crystal Handle Makeup Brushes Powder Blush Brush Foundation Brush Blending Eye shadow Concealer Makeup Brush Set (Pink) Review Date: 2021/03/25 Store: DOYIZZ Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DOYIZZ', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow, For Concealing, For Blush, For Foundation', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 5.71 x 1.61 inches; 5.93 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a nice set of brushes. The brush is a soft pink synthetic fiber. The handles are a pinkish crystal handle. The brushes come in a clear plastic bag that closes to store your brushes. Review Title: Nice Set of Brushes Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Review Title: Not Impressed Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spray Bottle, 1.7oz / 50ml Transparent Empty Fine Mist Plastic Reusable Travel Bottle Set, With 4 Funnels And 6 Labels, Suitable For Perfume, Essential Oil Spray, Medical Alcohol, Etc. (4 Pieces) Review Date: 2020/11/08 Store: Staont Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Staont', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '1.7 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4.5 x 1.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '682604904566'} Review Text: This package consist of 4 small plastic bottles. Each bottle holds 1.7oz of liquid. Each bottle has a fine mist sprayer and a cap to cover the sprayer. We have used 2 bottles and each one did a good job spraying. The cap sealed good and there were no leaks. There are 4 funnels to use when filling your bottles. Overall, I am happy with these bottles. Review Title: Good Little Bottles Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy Review Date: 2021/01/10 Store: AYL Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} Review Text: This package of 2 glass spray bottles and supplies is perfect. Basically everything to make using these empty bottles easy and useful. The box includes 2 empty amber spray bottles, 2 black leak-proof caps, 2 black spray head, 1 stainless funnel, 1 glass dropper, 4 black stickers, and 1 white marker. The bottles can be filled with 16 oz of whatever liquid you need. The bottles can be used as spray bottles or can be used with tight fitting leak proof caps. The funnel makes filling the bottles easy also. We love this set and highly recommend it. Review Title: Perfect Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Steamer with Portable Mini Cold Facial Mister, Face Steamer for Facial Deep Cleaning, Nano Ionic Face Hot Steaming Machine for Home Facials Personal Moisturizing Skincare Beauty Review Date: 2021/02/10 Store: ROSEFEAST Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Brand': 'ROSEFEAST', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Cold,Moisturizing,Relaxing,Clean,Aromatherapy', 'Package Dimensions': '8.31 x 7.87 x 4.57 inches; 1.57 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'ROSEFEAST'} Review Text: This is a small facial steamer that has had good results for my daughter. She has another unit that must be 3X bigger than this unit. This unit is approx 5.25" x 3.5" x 6.5" tall. This is a compact unit. We were first concerned that this would even work but after a few uses she is very happy with the operation of this unit. The unit includes the main compact unit, a small hand held unit, a mask, and 4 tools. I took 1 star away because of the price. She is happy with the results. Review Title: Small Unit, Good Results Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: DOYIZZ Makeup Brushes Set, 10pcs Crystal Handle Makeup Brushes Powder Blush Brush Foundation Brush Blending Eye shadow Concealer Makeup Brush Set (Pink) Review Date: 2021/03/25 Store: DOYIZZ Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DOYIZZ', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow, For Concealing, For Blush, For Foundation', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 5.71 x 1.61 inches; 5.93 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a nice set of brushes. The brush is a soft pink synthetic fiber. The handles are a pinkish crystal handle. The brushes come in a clear plastic bag that closes to store your brushes. Review Title: Nice Set of Brushes Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

**Shopping Behavior Summary**

1. **Food Preferences**: Strong inclination towards name-brand food products, particularly enjoying traditional styles. Favor towards lower-calorie and health-conscious options (e.g., low-calorie sauerkraut).

2. **Beauty & Personal Care**: High interest in skincare tools (e.g., jade rollers, facial steamers) and effective, reliable nail care products. Preference for quality over price, noting performance and design features.

3. **Home & Organization**: Engagement with practical spray bottles for both personal use and gardening, highlighting value in functionality and design. This individual demonstrates a tendency towards multi-purpose and quality storage solutions.

4. **Consumer Feedback**: Generally positive, with high ratings for functionality and satisfaction. Discontent noted with overpriced or lower quality items, indicating a discerning consumer who values perceived worth.

5. **Gifting**: Possible focus on practical gifts, particularly within the beauty and care category, such as makeup brushes.

Overall, this buyer exhibits a strong preference for quality, functionality, and brand reliability across food, beauty, and home organization categories.

target_interaction.title: Good Price for Good Clips
target_interaction.text: Both my girls have longer hair and like to get it off their neck during the hot summer months.  My girls have been using these clips for a week and so far, so good.  There are 8 hair clips in this package so they each took 4 clips.  There are 2 styles.  One style is curved teeth clips while the other is more a rectangle with teeth.  The girls have tried both styles and they say both work well.  Only time will tell us if these clips will last but at under $10 for 8 clips who cares.  Both girls are happy with the style, colors and cost.
target_interaction.title_meta: Big Hair Claw Clips for Women and Girls - 4.3 Inch 8 Pcs Matte Claw Hair Clips for Thick Hair, Large Jaw Clips for Thin Hair, 2 Styles Strong Hold Hair Accessories for Girls
